name: vovk-monorepo
description: RESTful RPC for Next.js - Transforms Next.js into a powerful REST API platform with RPC capabilities.

scripts.ncu: turbo run ncu --dangerously-disable-package-manager-check && npm run --prefix test ncu && npm-check-updates -u && npm i
scripts.test:main: npm --prefix test run dev-exit && npm run lint-nofix && turbo run tsc --dangerously-disable-package-manager-check && tsc --project ./packages/vovk-cli/tsconfig.json --noemit && npm run unit
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:main && npm run test:cli
scripts.unit: cross-env PORT=3210 concurrently "sleep 30 && npm run test:unit" "npm run serve:unit" --kill-others --success first
scripts.unit:watch: cross-env PORT=3210 concurrently "sleep 30 && npm run test:unit:watch" "npm run serve:unit" --kill-others --success first
scripts.serve:unit: npm --prefix test run generate && npm --prefix test run build && npm --prefix test run start
scripts.build: npm run rm-dist --prefix packages/vovk && npm run build --prefix packages/vovk && turbo run build --force --dangerously-disable-package-manager-check
scripts.vpub-check-vars: if [ -z "$VERSION_TYPE" ] || [ -z "$PACKAGE" ] || [ -z "$NPM_TAG" ]; then echo 'Error: some vars are not set'; exit 1; fi;
scripts.vpub:commit-and-publish: TAG=$PACKAGE-v$(node -p "require('./packages/$PACKAGE/package.json').version") && git commit -am "$TAG" && npm run --prefix ./packages/$PACKAGE npm-publish -- --tag=$NPM_TAG && git push && git push --tags
scripts.vpub: npm run vpub-check-vars && npm t && npm-run-all -s vpub:*
scripts.draft-notest-all: for PACKAGE in vovk vovk-cli vovk-init vovk-client vovk-validate-client-ajv vovk-zod vovk-yup vovk-dto; do PACKAGE=$PACKAGE npm run draft-notest; done

author: Andrii Gubanov
